text:
[redacted_name] lascia interamente in eredità la propria quota di proprietà a [redacted_name] ed esclude completamente dal testamento stesso altri familiari eventualmente in vita al momento del decesso.
Con il presente accordo disponiamo che in caso di divorzio la casa rimanga in proprietà interamente di [redacted_name].
Se al momento del decesso di [redacted_name], [redacted_name] fosse già deceduta, [redacted_name] lascia interamente la propria quota di casa in eredità a [redacted_name], figlia di [redacted_name] escludendo altri familiari eventualmente in vita al momento del decesso.
Se [redacted_name] dovesse morire prima di [redacted_name], concordiamo che la nuda proprietà della casa sia destinata interamente a [redacted_name], mentre [redacted_name] conserva l’usufrutto fino al suo decesso.
Nel caso in cui [redacted_name] e [redacted_name] decedono insieme, concordiamo di lasciare interamente la casa in eredità a [redacted_name], figlia di [redacted_name].
[redacted_name] ed [redacted_name] inoltre si impegnano ad effettuare lavori necessari di ristrutturazione facendo uso delle risorse familiari a disposizione.
trans:
[redacted_name] leaves its entire share of property to [redacted_name] and completely excludes other family members who may be alive at the time of their death from the will.
With this agreement, we establish that in the event of a divorce, the house shall remain entirely in the ownership of [redacted_name].
If, [redacted_name] is already deceased at the time of [redacted_name]'s death, [redacted_name] will leave its entire share of the household to [redacted_name•], the daughter of [redacted_name] and shall exclude any other family members who may be alive at the time of death.
If [redacted_name] were to die before [redacted_name], we agree that the bare ownership of the house shall be entirely granted to [redacted_name], while [redacted_name] retains the usufruct until their death.
In the event that [redacted_name] and [redacted_name] pass away together, we agree to leave the house entirely in inheritance to [redacted_name], the daughter of [redacted_name].
[redacted_name] and [redacted_name] also commit to carrying out the necessary renovation work using the family’s available resources.
